title: UK weather: Fresh yellow warning for thunderstorms comes into force this morning
description: Forecasters have warned of possible flash flooding, public transport disruptions, road closures and power cuts due to heavy rain.
content:
A yellow thunderstorm warning will come into force this morning - with heavy rain, lighting and hail set to hit parts of southern England.
The alert, covering areas including Bristol, Oxford, Southampton, London, Kent and Ipswich, will be in effect f... [1674 chars]

title: E.coli infections rise by 26% - as source of outbreaks and most vulnerable age groups revealed
description: STEC is often transmitted by eating contaminated food but can also be spread by close contact with an infected person, as well as direct contact with an infected animal or where it lives.
content:
Infections from a strain of E.coli that causes stomach issues rose by more than 25% last year - with toddlers most commonly affected, figures show.
The UK Health Security Agency has said the rise was partly down to a single outbreak linked to contami... [3806 chars]

title: Hotel tycoon reveals Heathrow runway expansion proposal
description: Arora Group says a shorter runway will avoid the cost and disruption of diverting the M25 motorway.

title: Three-minute heroes
description: TikTok made songs shorter but now artists are pushing back with longer tracks with more emotional resonance.
content:
